From: Shelly Horton <shelly@shellshockedmedia.com>
Sent: Monday, 12 May 2025 2:51 PM
To: Angela Phung <angela.phung@monashivf.com>; Claire Ellem <claire.ellem@monashivf.com>; Darren Robinson <darren@shellshockedmedia.com>; Fiona Allen <fiona.allen@monashivfgroup.com>; Jena McKimmie <jena.mckimmie@monashivf.com>; Kate Robertson <krobertson@monashivfwest.com>; Nicolette Curtis <ncurtis@monashivf.com>; Rebecca Redden <rredden@monashivf.com>; Sarah Bollom <sarah.bollom@monashivf.com>; Sloane Karlson <sloane.karlson@monashivfgroup.com>; Thierry Panthier <thierry.panthier@monashivfgroup.com>
Subject: Re: Speak with Impact Workshop May 20


You don't often get email from shelly@shellshockedmedia.com. Learn why this is important
THINK BEFORE YOU CLICK: This email originated from outside of Monash IVF Group. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. Please report all suspicious emails to helpdesk@monashivf.com as an attachment.

Hi team,

I'm really looking forward to working with you in the upcoming Speak with Impact session - it's going to be a high-energy, practical workshop to help you polish your presentation skills and boost your confidence. To make sure you get the most out of our time together, there are two things you need to complete before COB Friday 16th May:

1. Complete the One-Hour Online Course
You've been sent access to my Speak with Impact online training. This short course will help you understand the fundamentals of engaging communication and get your mindset ready for the workshop. Please make sure you've completed it before we meet - it really will make a big difference.

I get notified when you do the course and I can see only a few of you have done it so far, so make sure you put it in the diary over the next few days.

2. Prep Your Presentation (and Email Me Your Topic!)
In the workshop, each of you will be presenting to camera for approx. 2 minutes - and yes, we'll be watching it back together for constructive feedback. It's a fantastic chance to practise a real-world situation like speaking at a health conference, presenting an internal briefing, or hosting a community info session.
To prepare:
  • Think of a real-life topic or scenario relevant to your role
  • Structure it into three dot points to guide your delivery, as you'll learn from the online course, it's important to include an anecdote or real life example.
  • Keep it natural and aim for approx. 2 minutes in length. Do not memorise a script!

Please email me your presentation topic and three dot points by 5pm this Friday 16th May.

The more prep you do, the more value you'll get out of the session. This is your chance to step up, speak up, and shine on camera - and I can't wait to help you do it.

Any questions please email me.

See you next week,

Shelly



Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
www.shellshockedmedia.com

On Mon, 28 Apr 2025 at 15:21, Shelly Horton <shelly@shellshockedmedia.com> wrote:
Hello everyone,

I just sent the Zoom invite for the Speak with Impact Workshop I'll be hosting on May 20 from 2-4pm.

Attached is a one hour online media training course for you to complete before that session. Even though some of you won't be facing the media the same tricks and tips apply when speaking with impact and presenting well.

Then on the day we will dive straight into practical and film you presenting and watch back on the spot for advice on how to improve. And yes it tells me when you do the course so don't leave it to the last minute!

https://shellshockedmedia.com/services/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/

Click through and then in the "Apply Coupon" type in COMPLETEBEFORETRAINING for a 100% discount. It's normally $397 and you get to keep it for life.


I'm looking forward to working with you all.

Shelly x
